quote.value: “The allocation of assets to satisfy a high probability of achieving desired income in retirement is a radically different goal from the goal of maximizing wealth at retirement.”

tab_content_intro.value: “You specialize in something until one day you find it is specializing you” - Arthur Miller

tab_content.value:
At Redstone, we know bonds.

As a fiduciary specializing in the active management of fixed income, we are uniquely qualified to oversee and safeguard that allocation of your wealth earmarked for safekeeping.

Bonds play an essential role in wealth preservation. 

Bonds are contractual obligations to pay, and when properly managed, are uniquely suited to ensure your capital will be returned along with a guaranteed income. 

As we like to say; “Every good bond always goes to par.”

We do not rely on ratings agencies or bond insurance, instead we engage in our own evaluation of underlying credit profiles, at purchase and on an on-going basis. 

Our expertise in bonds covers all sectors, security types, credit profiles and payment structures, enabling us to attain to the role of trusted steward for our clients.
